story.text: Jan 3 CBRL Group Inc. (CBRL.O), which owns Cracker Barrel Old Country Store restaurants, reported a 0.8 percent decline in comparable store sales at its restaurants. Comparable sales at its retail stores rose 2.5 percent for the four weeks ended Dec. 22, 2006. Cracker Barrel has stores attached to its restaurants that sell food and gifts. (Reporting by Ankur Relia in Bangalore)
story.title: cracker barrel parent ' s dec same - store sales down
